decoder.name: modsecurity-fields
decoder.regex: ^Access denied with code (\d+) \(phase (\d+)\). Matched "Operator `(\.+)' with parameter `(\.+)' against variable `(\.+)' \(Value: `(\.+)' \) [file "(\.+)"] [line "(\d+)"] [id "(\d+)"] [rev "(\.*)"] [msg "(\.+)"] [data "(\.*)"] [severity "(\d+)"] [ver "(\.*)"] [maturity "(\d+)"] [accuracy "(\d+)"] [hostname "(\.+)"] [uri "(\.+)"] [unique_id "(\.+)"]
decoder.order: status, phase, operator, parameter, variable, value, file, line, id, rev, msg, data, severity, ver, maturity, accuracy, hostname, uri, unique_id
